Operators(Functions)

iOps Operators

InteractionOps provides a comprehensive set of operators organized into functional categories. Each operator is designed to enhance Blender workflow through context-sensitive operations.

Core System

Functional Button System

The heart of InteractionOps - context-sensitive F1-F5 operations.

Core System

  • IOPS Main
  • Functional “F1/F2/F3/F4/F5” Buttons
  • Modes

Object Operations

Alignment & Positioning

Tools for precise object positioning and orientation.

Alignment Tools

  • Align Between Two
  • Align Origin to Normal
  • Align Origin To Face Normal
  • Object Align to Face
  • Drop It
  • Put On

Transform Operations

Object transformation and manipulation tools.

Transform Tools

  • Complex Modal Rotation - 3 Points
  • Object Three Point Rotation
  • Object Rotate
  • Rotate object local X/Y/Z-axis by 90 degrees
  • Normalize Location/Rotation/Scale/Dimensions values
  • Match Transform Active

Object Utilities

General object management and utility operations.

Object Utilities

  • Object Auto Smooth
  • Kitbash Grid
  • Name from Active
  • Object Replace
  • UV Maps Add/Remove
  • UV Maps Cleaner
  • Object Visual Origin
  • Visual Origin

Mesh Operations

Selection Tools

Mesh selection and highlighting operations.

Selection Tools

  • Select Bounded Loop/Ring
  • Grow Loop/Ring Selection
  • Select Bounded Ring
  • Mouse Fill Select
  • Mouseover Fill Select
  • Mesh Convert Selection

Mesh Editing

Direct mesh manipulation and editing tools.

Mesh Editing

  • Connect Edges
  • LineUp Selected Edges
  • Equalize edges
  • Delete Selection
  • Mirror Mesh Along Selected Face
  • Mesh to Grid
  • Cursor Bisect

Mesh Utilities

Mesh analysis and utility operations.

Mesh Utilities

  • Copy Edges Angle
  • Copy Edges Length
  • Mesh Quick Snap
  • UV Channel Hop
  • Assign Vertex Color

Snap & Transform

Snapping Operations

Advanced snapping and positioning tools.

Snapping Tools

  • Drag Snap (Object/UV)
  • Drag Snap Cursor
  • Drag Snap UV
  • Quick Snap
  • Snap Combos

Grid Operations

Grid-based positioning and layout tools.

Grid Tools

  • Grid from active object
  • Z-Ops

Modifiers & Effects

Easy Modifiers

Interactive modifier setup and control.

Modifier Tools

  • Easy Array Modifier
  • Easy Curve Modifier
  • Easy Solidify/Bevel Modifier

Curve Operations

Curve Editing

Curve manipulation and editing tools.

Curve Tools

  • Curve Spline Type
  • Curve Subdivide
  • Cursor Rotate

UI & Workflow

Interface Operations

Viewport and interface management tools.

Interface Tools

  • Split Screen Area
  • Split Screen Area New
  • Save/Load Space Data
  • UI Property Switch
  • Maya Isolate

Collection Management

Outliner and collection organization tools.

Collection Tools

  • Outliner Collection Ops

Asset & Material Management

Asset Operations

Asset loading and management tools.

Asset Tools

  • Open Asset in Current Blender
  • Render Asset Thumbnail

Material & Texture Tools

Material and texture workflow operations.

Material Tools

  • Materials from Textures
  • Image Reload
  • Library Reload

Scripting & Automation

Script Execution

Custom script and automation tools.

Scripting Tools

  • Executor

  • Script Executor

Workflow Enhancement

Context Switching

Mode and context management operations.

Context Tools

  • Cyclic Switching Axis/PivotPoint/Snap
